name: liri-node-app
description: >Liri is a lot like Apple iPhone's Siri.  Liri is a Language Interpretation and Recognition Interface, whereas Siri is a Speech Interpretation and Recognition Interface. Liri is a command line Node application that takes in four parameters and then returns data relative to what was inputted. `spotify-this-song` `movie-this` `do-what-it-says`
